response.answer_text: Like anything else they are only profitable if they are successful. Google is incredibly profitable because it’s the best search engine in the world. Bing is less successful so it probably doesn’t contribute very much to Microsoft’s bottom line. Yahoo as a company has been floundering for many years and its search engine hasn’t helped out that much.

Alphabet – Google's parent company is the most valuable company in the world. Alphabet has a market cap of $547.1 billion (February 2016). So yes, they are very, very profitable. Alphabet tops Apple as most valuable firm
